items.content_html: Ohok (pronounced "oh-okay") is a lightweight and customizable text editor widget designed for web applications. It is easy to integrate and highly extensible.
items.title: Yigaue/oh-ok: Ohok (pronounced "oh-okay") is a lightweight and customizable text editor widget designed for web applications. It is easy to integrate and highly extensible.

items.content_html: Asset Preloader is a lightweight JavaScript module for efficiently preloading assets in web applications. It supports images, videos, sounds, 3D models, and other file types with features such as event-driven progress tracking, retry mechanisms, batch loading, and customizable UI options.
items.title: motionharvest/asset-preloader: Asset Preloader is a lightweight JavaScript module for efficiently preloading assets in web applications. It supports images, videos, sounds, 3D models, and other file types with features such as event-driven progress tracking, retry mechanisms, batch loading, and customizable UI options.

items.content_html: Sym-Pick is a lightweight and efficient VS Code extension that makes inserting Unicode symbols effortless. It provides a searchable list of symbols and emojis that can be inserted into your code with a single click.
items.title: bwlange/sym-pick: Sym-Pick is a lightweight and efficient VS Code extension that makes inserting Unicode symbols effortless. It provides a searchable list of symbols and emojis that can be inserted into your code with a single click.

items.content_html: A flexible and lightweight SDK for integrating WeChat Pay with dynamic endpoints, caching, and response transformations.
items.title: nuecms/wepay-sdk: A flexible and lightweight SDK for integrating WeChat Pay with dynamic endpoints, caching, and response transformations.

items.content_html: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.
items.title: DuckySoLucky/hypixel-discord-chat-bridge: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.

items.content_html: NumPix is a lightweight and efficient handwritten digit recognition app powered by Spring Boot and TensorFlow. Simply draw a digit (0-9) on the web canvas, and NumPix will predict it instantly using a deep learning model trained on the MNIST dataset.
items.title: AyushPrakash414/NumPix-: NumPix is a lightweight and efficient handwritten digit recognition app powered by Spring Boot and TensorFlow. Simply draw a digit (0-9) on the web canvas, and NumPix will predict it instantly using a deep learning model trained on the MNIST dataset.
